Stephen V. Gordon,
stephen.gordon@ucd.ie
Keywords
Mycobacterium bovis, AF2122/97, bovine tuberculosis, reference genome, re-
sequencing, re-annotation.
Abstract
We report an update to the reference genome of the bovine tuberculosis bacillus
Mycobacterium bovis AF2122/97 generated using an integrative multi-'omics
approach.
Updates
include
42
new
CDS,
14
modified
annotations,
26
SNP
corrections, and disclosure that the RD900 locus, previously described as absent
from the genome, is in fact present.
